TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileRegion extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示要存档的文件区域。

span.span: Represents a region of a file to be archived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含生成 中的数据的一致备份所必需的信息。A object contains the information necessary to generate a consistent backup of the data in a . 实际数据包含在 属性所返回的 对象的可枚举集合中。The actual data is contained in the enumerable collection of objects returned by the property. 每个 实例都表示文件中必须存档的字节序列。Each instance represents a sequence of bytes in a file that must be archived. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 和 类将日志存储存档到 XML。The following example demonstrates how to archive a log store to XML using the and classes. [!code-csharp[FileRegion#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/fileregion/cs/fileregion.cs#0)] [!code-vb[FileRegion#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/fileregion/vb/fileregion.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileLength As Long
public: property long FileLength { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取文件的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the length of the file in bytes.

value.span: 文件的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length of the file in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回整个文件的长度，而不是文件中单个区域的长度。This property returns the length of the entire file instead of that of a single region in the file. 通过检查 方法所返回的流的 属性，可以获得文件中区域的长度。The length of the region in the file can be found by examining the property of the stream returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 和 类将日志存储存档到 XML。The following example demonstrates how to archive a log store to XML using the and classes. [!code-csharp[FileRegion#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/fileregion/cs/fileregion.cs#0)] [!code-vb[FileRegion#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/fileregion/vb/fileregion.vb#0)]

summary.span: 返回可用于读取待存档数据的流。

A stream that contains the data to be archived.

exception.span: 由于出现意外的 I/O 异常，因此无法执行该请求。

span.span: The request could not be performed because of an unexpected I/O exception.

exception.span: 该方法是在序列已释放之后调用的。

span.span: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存来继续执行该程序。

span.span: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.

exception.span: 操作系统拒绝了对指定的日志存储区的访问。

span.span: Access for the specified log store is denied by the operating system.
